v_etoi_glave_ty_igraesh_za_zoomagazin_po: In this chapter, you play as the pet shop, so you must be very careful when buying kittens. Playing as the pet shop, you can trade with the city, which will never buy sick kittens.
pitomnik_khochet_prodat_tebe_kotikov_kli: The cattery wants to sell you kittens. Click on the envelope to view the offer.
odobri_etu_sdelku_ne_proveryaya_kotikov_: Approve this deal without checking the kittens. Let’s see what happens.
teper_peretashchi_kotyat_iz_svoei_vitrin: Now drag the kittens from your showcase into the city’s showcase to sell them.
v_etot_raz_my_kupili_u_pitomnika_bolnykh: This time we bought sick kittens from the cattery and confirmed that the city does not buy sick kittens.
pitomnik_khochet_prodat_tebe_neskolko_ko: The cattery wants to sell you several kittens. Click on the black boy kitten to check whether they are healthy.
peretashchi_lupu_iz_pravogo_nizhnego_ugl: Drag the magnifier from the bottom right corner onto the kittens to check whether they are healthy.
pitomnik_zadumal_prodat_tebe_bolnogo_kot: The cattery intends to sell you a sick kitten. You will not be able to sell it to the city. Close the magnifier and decline the deal.
vyvod_zoomagazin_nikogda_ne_smozhet_prod: Conclusion — the pet shop will never be able to sell a sick kitten to the city. Be careful before buying. To complete the practical task, look at how we calculated it:
izuchi_vkhodyashchie_zayavki_i_reshi_kak: Study the incoming requests and decide which one should be accepted.
